Battera::

She had wandered into a small repair bay. She looked and saw no one 
was there. She went to the computer and started looking for the list 
again. In a matter of minutes, she found what she was looking for and 
a few other tib bits of info. She walked out and noted no one was 
around. She went down the hall, turned the corner and headed towards 
the mess hall. She smiled when she saw Blackstorm. With her was 
another bot. She put on a smile, one she thought would suite a 
predacon and walked over. She coughed to anounce herself and nodded 
to them. "Hello. I am new here. Perhaps you can help me? Have either 
of you seen Perceptor? He was to finish my tour." Her tone sounding 
much friendlier than a predacon voice should sound.
